ruleBookInfo.author: $.author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
result = JSON.parse(decode(result)).result.book;
//result = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(result));

burl=source.getKey().match(/([^#]*)/)[1];
id = result.id;

source_url= burl + `/cdn/book/source/${id}.html`;
$ =java.ajax(source_url);
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
$ = JSON.parse(decode($)).result.list;
n=0;//é»˜è®¤é€‰æ‹©æº
v=String(book.getVariable("custom"));
x=v.match(/^\d+$/)?v:n;
x=parseInt(x)<$.length?x:n;

result.new_title = $[x].new_title;

if($.length>1){
		y = '\nğŸ“Œä½¿ç”¨è¯´æ˜ï¼š æ ¹æ®åºå·è®¾ç½®ä¹¦ç±å˜é‡æ¥åˆ‡æ¢æ¥æº(é»˜è®¤0)ï¼Œè‹¥ä¹¦ç±IDä¸º0 (9xé™¤å¤–)ï¼Œåˆ™ä¸ºç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹ç½‘ç«™ã€‚\nğŸ¯å½“å‰æºï¼šåºå·ğŸ”º'+x+'ğŸ”»ã€'+$[x].name+'ã€‘'+(x==0?' (é»˜è®¤)':'');
for(i in $){
		y += '\nâ¤åºå·ğŸ”º'+i+'ğŸ”»ã€'+$[i].name+'ã€‘\nä¹¦ç±IDï¼š'+$[i].internal_book_id+'\né€‰ç”¨ç‡ï¼š'+$[i].show_text+' \næºåœ°å€ï¼š '+$[i].chapter_list_url+'\næœ€æ–°ç« èŠ‚ï¼š '+$[i].new_title;
	}
result.description += y
}

try{ book_id=$[x].internal_book_id; }
 catch(e) { book_id = id;}
 
 if(x==0&&book_id==0){ 
 	book_id = id;
 	java.put('book_id',book_id);
 	result.tocUrl = `/cdn/book/chapterList/${book_id}.html`;
 }
else if(x!=0&&book_id==0) {
	 tUrl = $[x].chapter_list_url;
	 result.tocUrl = tUrl+"," + JSON.stringify({"headers":{"Referer": tUrl}});
	}
else if(book_id!=0){ 
	java.put('book_id',book_id);
		result.tocUrl = `/cdn/book/chapterList/${book_id}.html`;
	}

result = JSON.stringify(result);
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: $.name

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
if(baseUrl.match(/cdn\/book\/chapterList/)){
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
data = JSON.parse(decode(result)).result.list;
length = data.length;
chapterList = [];
for(var i = 0; i < length; i ++){
	name = "ğŸ®ã€–"+data[i].name+"ã€—ğŸ®";
	chapterList.push({
			text: name,
			href: null,
			volume: true
	})	
	data[i].list.forEach(($) => {						
		text = $.name;
		id = $.id;
		book_id = java.get('book_id');
		//book_id = baseUrl.match(/\/(\d+).html/)[1];
    href = `/cdn/book/content/${book_id}/${id}.html`;   
    chapterList.push({
			text: text,
			href: href	
	})
	})	
	}
chapterList
}
else{
	chapterList = [];
	datas = java.getElement("dd@a").toArray();
	//java.log(JSON.stringify(chapterList));
	for (var i = 0; i < datas.length; i++) {
    text = datas[i].text();
			hre = baseUrl.split(',')[0]+datas[i].attr("href");
			d=String(hre).split('\/');
list=[];
d.forEach((s, index)=>{ 
	 if (list.indexOf(s) == -1) {
 	   list.push(s);      }
		
		});
		href = list.toString().replace(/,/g,"/");
						
     chapterList.push({
		 	 text: text,
		  	 href: href	
      	})            
   };
	chapterList
	}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
let res = JSON.parse(result).data.content function getComic(result) { let mat = result.match(/
([\s\S]*?)<\/article>/); try { let cnt = JSON.parse( mat ? mat[1].replace(/\&/g, '"').replace(/\;/g, "").replace(/\#34/g, "") : result ); return (mat ? cnt.skeleton.data : cnt.picInfos) .map((i) => { let path = mat ? cnt.materials[i.element_name].data.web_uri : "novel-pic/" + i.md5; return ``; }) .join("
"); } catch (e) { // not comic content mat = result.match(/([\s\S]*?)<\/body>/) // java.log(result) return (mat ? mat[1] : result).toString().replace(/\<\!DOCTYPE html.*/g, "").replace(/\/, "").replace(/\\<\/a\>/g, "") } } result = getComic(String(res)); result.replace(/\{\!\-\- PGC_VOICE\:.*\-\-\}/g, "")

ruleExplore.author: author##</?em>
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
let list = [];
let resultData = JSON.parse(result);

let targetData = resultData.data || resultData.list || resultData.book_list || 
                resultData.publication_list || resultData.result || resultData;
                
if (targetData != null && targetData.book_shelf_info) {
    let bookIds = targetData.book_shelf_info.map(item => `{"book_id": "${item.book_id}"}`).join(',');
    
    let booksData = java.ajax(
`https://fanqienovel.com/api/bookshelf/multidetail,{"method": "post","body": {"books":[${bookIds}]}}`
        );
    
    let books = JSON.parse(booksData).data.detail_list;
    for (let i in books) {
        let d = books[i];
        list.push({
            src: d,
            book_name: d.book_name,
            author: d.author,
            category:d.category,
            tags:d.tags,
            word_number:d.word_number,
            lastChapterTitle: d.last_chapter_title,
            abstract: d.abstract,
            book_id: d.book_id,
        });
    }
} else {
    list = targetData.content || targetData;
}

JSON.stringify({data: list})
</js>
data.data||data.list||book_list||data.publication_list||data.result||data
ruleExplore.name: book_name||bookName

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
let list = [];
let book_list = [];
let res = JSON.parse(result);
let key = String(java.get("key"));
let page = Number(java.get("page"));

try {
  if (res.search_tabs) {
    for (let i = 0; i < res.search_tabs.length; i++) {
        let books = res["search_tabs"][i]["data"];
        if (books != null) list = list.concat(books);
    }
  }
} catch (e) {}

for (let $ of list) {
   book_list.push($.book_data ? $.book_data[0] : ($.video_data ? $.video_data[0] : $));
}

JSON.stringify(book_list)
</js>$[*]

ruleExplore.author: $.author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
u='â– ';nu='â–¡'
m=baseUrl.split('/')
s=[1,{id:m[6],name:m[4],host:m[4],url:baseUrl}]
o=java.getElement('#chapterlist@div[style].0@a')
x=book.getVariable("custom")
for(i in o){
	m=o[i].attr('href').split('/')
	s.push({id:m[4],name:o[i].text(),host:m[2],url:source.key+o[i].attr('href')})
}
if(x!=''){n=Number(x);r=s[n];if(r.id){s[0]=n;java.toast('åˆ‡æ¢åˆ°æº"'+r.host+'"');result=java.ajax(r.url);java.setContent(result)}else{java.toast('æ²¡æœ‰ç¼–å·ä¸º"'+x+'"çš„æº')}}
time=java.getString('meta[property=og:novel:update_time]@content')
java.put('time',time)
info=''
for(i=1;i<s.length;i++){
	info+=(s[0]==i?u:nu)+i+'ï¼š'+s[i].name+'\n'
}
pay=result.match(/" vip"/)
pay&&java.put('pay',pay[0])
java.put('info',info)
s=s[s[0]]
java.put('bookid',s.id)
java.put('source',s.host)
toc=source.key+result.match(/url\s*=\s*'(.+?list.*?)'/)[1]+',{"headers":{"referer":"'+s.url+'"}}'
java.put('toc',toc)
cache.delete(toc)
tocData=getTocData()
if(!tocData){
	java.toast('ç›®å½•è¢«åƒæ‰äº†ï¼ï¼')
}else{
	java.put('last',tocData[tocData.length-1].title+'Â·'+time)
}
result
</js>.container

var Url = source.key;
if (Url.endsWith('/')){
	Url = Url.slice(0, -1);
	}
var push = (title, url, type) => result.push({
	title: title,
	url: url,
	style: {
		layout_flexGrow: 1,
		layout_flexBasisPercent: type
		}
		});
push("ğŸ”¥çƒ­é—¨æ ‡ç­¾ğŸ”¥", null, 1);
try {
  var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(Url + "/newtags")); 
  var tags = doc.select(".tag ul a");
  for (var i = 0; i < tags.size(); i++) {	
  var tag = tags.get(i);
  var title = tag.text();
  var path = tag.attr("href");
  var pageUrl = Url + path;
  if (!pageUrl.endsWith("/")) pageUrl += "/";  
  push(title, pageUrl + "{{page}}", 0.2);
  }
  java.toast("\nğŸ”å…±è·å–åˆ°" + tags.size() + "ä¸ªçƒ­é—¨æ ‡ç­¾");
} catch (e) {
    java.toast("âš ï¸ è§£æé”™è¯¯: " + e.message);
}
JSON.stringify(result);

var part1 = String(java.getString('.booknav2@p.3@text')).replace(/æ›´æ–°ï¼š/,'');

      part4 = String(tag[1]).replace(/,$/, '');
}
[part1, part2, part3, part4];

ruleBookInfo.tocUrl:
<js>
var id = result.match(/\/book\/(\d+)\.html/);
var bookid = id[1];
var base = '{{source.key}}';
if (base.endsWith('/')){
	base = base.slice(0, -1);
	}
var tocurl = base + '/ajax_novels/chapterlist/' + bookid + '.html';
result = tocurl;
</js>
